author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: NYPD Sergeant Testifies He Shot Mentally Ill Woman in Self-Defense
text:
A New York City police sergeant took the stand in his murder trial Tuesday and testified that he fatally shot a 66-year-old mentally ill woman to stop the potentially lethal swing of a baseball bat at his head.
In his first public statement on the 2016 incident, Sgt. Hugh Barry said he had persuaded the Bronx woman, Deborah Danner, to drop a pair of scissors and step out of her bedroom, but then she dashed back into the room and threatened him with a baseball bat.
...
